    • Constructor Detail

      • ColumnMetadataImpl

        public ColumnMetadataImpl(String name,
                  int sqlType)
        Constructs a ColumnMetadataImpl object using name and SQL type.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this column.
        sqlType - The SQL type of this column. Supported types are:
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_BIGINT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_BINARY
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_BIT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_CHAR
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_DATE
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_DECIMAL
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_DOUBLE
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_FLOAT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_INTEGER
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_LONGVARBINARY
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_LONGVARCHAR
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_NUMERIC
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_REAL
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_SMALLINT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_TIME
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_TIMESTAMP
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_TINYINT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_UNKNOWN
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_VARBINARY
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_VARCHAR
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_BIT
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_WCHAR
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_WVARCHAR
        • ColumnMetadata.SQL_TYPE_WLONGVARCHAR
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or emply, or sqlType is invalid.

        public int getSQLType()

        public boolean hasMicrosecondResolution()
